name: Adventures of Skye the Slime Maid
name_original: Adventures of Skye the Slime Maid
description:
After departing from his old team, the protagonist of the game: Alex Goldstone, is now a solo Adventurer exploring the land of Bromwich. He currently helps the city of Tipton with its new Guild Centre with other Adventurers that complete quests for the community.

After weeks of assisting Tipton, Alex became a respectable Guild member to the townsfolk. He's doing well at his starting point, but everything changes when he encounters a slime.

A beautiful and noisy goddess named Larissa, the goddess of life and fertility, saw Alex save the slime from a wolf attack, and he took it home.

To reward the lone Adventurer for his rare act of kindness, she transforms the slime into a magical humanoid slime maid to serve her new master.

Since it’s Skye’s new dream to be an Adventurer like her master, Alex enrolls her to become a new Guild member for Tipton.

Alex and Skye will have many missions, fight choice-based creatures and bosses, and meet new friends along the way. The bond between Alex and Skye will grow into a romance, and we'll learn more about Alex's past in this comedy-romance, drama, fantasy, and fake RPG themed visual novel. Join their quest!
